Package org.ayushsingh.jdbc_jpa_demo.dao.impl

Class EmployeeDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
org.ayushsingh.jdbc_jpa_demo.dao.impl.EmployeeDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmployeeDao
@Component public class EmployeeDaoImpl extends Object implements EmployeeDao
Implementation of the EmployeeDao interface for performing CRUD operations related to employees. Uses JPA for database interaction.
Since:
2024-04-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
